message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $15000. Considering its significance, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for this remarkable product at a special price of $18000. This opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to acquiring only the best. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.
